name: Super 3D Noah's Ark
description: Super 3D Noah's Ark is a unofficial Christian-themed video game for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System and MS-DOS. It was developed by the biblical video game producer Wisdom Tree and released in 1994. It was the only commercially released SNES game in the U.S. that was not officially sanctioned by Nintendo. Despite its name, it is unrelated to Konami's official Noah's Ark for the Nintendo Entertainment System.
